channel.title: Comments on: Abject Submission 2: Lit Survey
channel.description: BDSM, books and missing links by Xiao Yingtai

item.title: By: Xiao Yingtai
item.dc:creator: Xiao Yingtai
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/abject-submission-2-lit-survey/#comment-149">Dirty Girl</a>.
That's a compliment! I would love to hear if you end up with a different conclusion.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Dirty Girl.

That’s a compliment! I would love to hear if you end up with a different conclusion.

item.title: By: Dirty Girl
item.dc:creator: Dirty Girl
item.description: Interesting classification. I'm slowly reading your older entries, because each one leaves me with so much to think about.
item.content:encoded: Interesting classification. I’m slowly reading your older entries, because each one leaves me with so much to think about.

item.title: By: Xiao Yingtai
item.dc:creator: Xiao Yingtai
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/abject-submission-2-lit-survey/#comment-87">Malin James</a>.
Your comment made me beam like a squeeing baby!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Malin James.

Your comment made me beam like a squeeing baby!

item.title: By: Malin James
item.dc:creator: Malin James
item.description: This is phenomenal. The lit geek in me is so happy right now!
item.content:encoded: This is phenomenal. The lit geek in me is so happy right now!

item.title: By: Yingtai
item.dc:creator: Yingtai
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/abject-submission-2-lit-survey/#comment-85">kleesbutterfly</a>.
I see you got my reply on the Blogging 201 Commons. Please feel free to borrow ideas from my <a href="http://s2.wp.com/?custom-css=1&csblog=3XHEJ&cscache=6&csrev=313" rel="nofollow">custom CSS</a>.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to kleesbutterfly.

I see you got my reply on the Blogging 201 Commons. Please feel free to borrow ideas from my custom CSS.

item.title: By: kleesbutterfly
item.dc:creator: kleesbutterfly
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/abject-submission-2-lit-survey/#comment-84">Yingtai</a>.
Thanks, too. But please explain to me in the Commons blog: How did you do your list with the Text Widget?
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Yingtai.

Thanks, too. But please explain to me in the Commons blog: How did you do your list with the Text Widget?

item.title: By: kleesbutterfly
item.dc:creator: kleesbutterfly
item.description: I love this pic! It's a good idea to feature arty photographs, that could draw people to your blog that feel put off by explicit shots on your front page.
item.content:encoded: I love this pic! It’s a good idea to feature arty photographs, that could draw people to your blog that feel put off by explicit shots on your front page.

item.title: By: Yingtai
item.dc:creator: Yingtai
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/abject-submission-2-lit-survey/#comment-83">kleesbutterfly</a>.
Thanks kleesbutterfly! Your images are AWESOME.
I've been learning a lot about my own taste from watching myself do this blog. Most of the nudity has been in the <a href="/when-you-need-a-kinky-laugh/" rel="nofollow ugc">humour collection</a>, of all things! I think I have never featured photographed nudity here. Somehow it just happened that way. I hope it's a nice change for others as well as myself.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to kleesbutterfly.

Thanks kleesbutterfly! Your images are AWESOME.

I’ve been learning a lot about my own taste from watching myself do this blog. Most of the nudity has been in the humour collection, of all things! I think I have never featured photographed nudity here. Somehow it just happened that way. I hope it’s a nice change for others as well as myself.
